commit message: Cleanup of duplicated resources with apollo.

Removed old apollo code.
Fixed compilation issues.
Using SDK 18 just for now due to remote view issues.
Minimal code to launch apollo activities (still not working).
Working simple player display from main menu.

More on API level issues.
Updated android gradle plugin.
Setting the notification bigContentView via reflection.
Using CompatMediaPlayer due to API level issues.
Commenting RemoteControlClient code due to API level issues.
Enabled back navigation from apollo main activity.
Skin of my music title bar.
Version and quotes changes in build.gradle.

Not using wifi multicast lock to save battery.
Updated android gradle plugin version.

Restored highlight of current playing song in audio player queue.
More on player skin.

Sharing files w/FrostWire from third party apps UX upgrade.

- If a media file is shared with FrostWire from a third party
app, FrostWire will make the file available for Wi-Fi sharing
and show the shared file on 'My Files'

- If the file is a .torrent, it will start the torrent transfer
and show it to the user.

Merge pull request #174 from gubatron/issue-13-show-my-files-on-share-files

Sharing files w/FrostWire from third party apps UX upgrade.

Fixed error reported in console.
Cleanup.

Avoid online download of music data/images.
Fixed notification and my music icons.
Restored launch AudioPlayerActivity when playing an audio file.
Update on donation views, less text.
Navigation/UX update makes 'My Music' easier to discover.
no animation when transitioning back to MainActivity
Fixed issue with player notification menu item.
Goes back to FrostWire's Main Activity when touching the action bar's title.
Player bottom action bar is now hidden on stop.
AudioPlayer activity action bar textview goes back to My Music.
Fix transfer speed, unit/precision reporting bug.
Fixes bug changing playlist cover image.
Using ClickAdapter to avoid context leak.
Use a click adapter on BaseActivity's Action bar TextView click listener to avoid possible context leak.
Audio files can be used as ringtones. Fixes.

Create Playlist / Add to Playlist user experience upgrade.

Adds songs to existing playlists from my files > audio.
MenuAdapter keeps a weak reference of context
added getContext() method to MenuAction
Some misc fixes on apollo to avoid possible null pointers, refactors.
Creates new playlist and ads selected tracks to it.
address case with playlist of existing name recursively. move getPlaylists() to MusicUtils.
adds song to playlist from player window.
default artwork image updated everywhere.

Add to playlist actions added to player action bar menus, playlists still not refreshed. default artworks updated.
